Text_to_editors: Text to be sent to our editors:
Text_under_checkbox_error:
If you find an error, right-click 
or long press on the verse.
Thanks_report2: Our translation team will be sure to process your request.
introStart: Here is an interactive guide to the Bible Study App(BSA). We want to show you the functionality of BSA. Let's go!
introAppBar: In the upper part there is an application bar (app bar). Here, in the 'Bible' mode, you can select a book and a chapter, and in mode 'Open Bible Stories'(OBS) - you can select a history. There is a button on the right that opens the main menu (hamburger menu).
introBookList: The book selection window in the 'Bible' mode. After selecting a book, the chapter selection window will automatically open.
introChapterList: Chapter selection window in the 'Bible' mode.
introShortCuts:
You can switch a book, chapter, verse using hotkeys (shortcuts): 
 ctrl + shift + right - next book 
 ctrl + shift + left - previous book 
 ctrl + right - next chapter 
 ctrl + left - previous chapter 
 ctrl + down - next verse 
 ctrl + up - previous verse
introWorkSpace: This is a workspace. It contains cards that you can add, delete, change the size, location.
introCard: Each card displays the source (Bible translation, OBS, educational resources, resources for translators)
introVerse: You can work with each verse separately. When you click on it, the current reference changes, which allows you to change additional information in open cards with educational resources(TN,TQ,TA, TW).
introContextMenu: When you right-click on any verse, the context menu opens. You can copy a verse or send an error message in this verse.
introReportDialog: When you use the error sending element, you must specify a comment. After sending the message, a window will open with a link where you can see your message saved on Github
introHamburger: The main menu of the application. Here you can: add a new card, switch between the OBS and the Bible, reset the workspace state (the cards will open by default), change the font size in the cards, change the interface language and open user's guide.
